description: Returns an existing form for an Amplify app.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: environmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment that is part of the Amplify app.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the form.

nested_items.name: appId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the Amplify app associated with the form.

nested_items.name: environmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment that is a part of the Amplify app.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the form.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the form.

nested_items.name: formActionType
nested_items.description: The operation to perform on the specified form.

nested_items.name: horizontalGap
nested_items.description: The spacing for the horizontal gap.

nested_items.name: tokenReference
nested_items.description: A reference to a design token to use to bind the form's style properties to an existing theme.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the style setting.

nested_items.name: verticalGap
nested_items.description: The spacing for the vertical gap.

nested_items.name: tokenReference
nested_items.description: A reference to a design token to use to bind the form's style properties to an existing theme.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the style setting.

nested_items.name: outerPadding
nested_items.description: The size of the outer padding for the form.

nested_items.name: tokenReference
nested_items.description: A reference to a design token to use to bind the form's style properties to an existing theme.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the style setting.

nested_items.name: dataSourceType
nested_items.description: The data source type, either an Amplify DataStore model or a custom data type.

nested_items.name: dataTypeName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the data type you are using as the data source for the form.

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: The label for the field.

nested_items.name: fixed
nested_items.description: The field position is fixed and doesn't change in relation to other fields.

nested_items.name: rightOf
nested_items.description: The field position is to the right of the field specified by the string.

nested_items.name: below
nested_items.description: The field position is below the field specified by the string.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to hide a field.

nested_items.name: inputType
nested_items.description: Describes the configuration for the default input value to display for a field.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The input type for the field.

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Specifies a field that requires input.

nested_items.name: readOnly
nested_items.description: Specifies a read only field.

nested_items.name: placeholder
nested_items.description: The text to display as a placeholder for the field.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value for the field.

nested_items.name: descriptiveText
nested_items.description: The text to display to describe the field.

nested_items.name: defaultChecked
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a field has a default value.

nested_items.name: defaultCountryCode
nested_items.description: The default country code for a phone number.

nested_items.name: valueMappings
nested_items.description: The information to use to customize the input fields with data at runtime.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The value and display value pairs.

nested_items.name: displayValue
nested_items.description: The value to display for the complex object.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value to assign to the input field.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind fields to data at runtime.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The form property to bind to the data field.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The data field to bind the property to.

nested_items.name: concat
nested_items.description: A list of form properties to concatenate to create the value to assign to this field property.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value to assign to the input field.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind fields to data at runtime.

nested_items.name: property
nested_items.description: The form property to bind to the data field.

nested_items.name: field
nested_items.description: The data field to bind the property to.

nested_items.name: concat
nested_items.description: A list of form properties to concatenate to create the value to assign to this field property.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: The information to bind fields to data at runtime.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The property type.

nested_items.name: bindingProperties
nested_items.description: Describes the properties to customize with data at runtime.

nested_items.name: model
nested_items.description: An Amplify DataStore model.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the field.

nested_items.name: minValue
nested_items.description: The minimum value to display for the field.

nested_items.name: maxValue
nested_items.description: The maximum value to display for the field.

nested_items.name: step
nested_items.description: The stepping increment for a numeric value in a field.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value for the field.

nested_items.name: isArray
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to render the field as an array. This property is ignored if the dataSourceType for the form is a Data Store.

nested_items.name: fileUploaderConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration for the file uploader field.

nested_items.name: accessLevel
nested_items.description: The access level to assign to the uploaded files in the Amazon S3 bucket where they are stored. The valid values for this property are private, protected, or public. For detailed information about the permissions associated with each access level, see File access levels in the Amplify documentation.

nested_items.name: acceptedFileTypes
nested_items.description: The file types that are allowed to be uploaded by the file uploader. Provide this information in an array of strings specifying the valid file extensions.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: showThumbnails
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to display or hide the image preview after selecting a file for upload. The default value is true to display the image preview.

nested_items.name: isResumable
nested_items.description: Allows the file upload operation to be paused and resumed. The default value is false.

nested_items.name: maxFileCount
nested_items.description: Specifies the maximum number of files that can be selected to upload. The default value is an unlimited number of files.

nested_items.name: maxSize
nested_items.description: The maximum file size in bytes that the file uploader will accept. The default value is an unlimited file size.

nested_items.name: validations
nested_items.description: The validations to perform on the value in the field.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The validation to perform on an object type.

nested_items.name: strValues
nested_items.description: The validation to perform on a string value.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: numValues
nested_items.description: The validation to perform on a number value.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: validationMessage
nested_items.description: The validation message to display.

nested_items.name: sectionalElements
nested_items.description: Stores the visual helper elements for the form that are not associated with any data.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of sectional element. Valid values are Heading, Text, and Divider.

nested_items.name: fixed
nested_items.description: The field position is fixed and doesn't change in relation to other fields.

nested_items.name: rightOf
nested_items.description: The field position is to the right of the field specified by the string.

nested_items.name: below
nested_items.description: The field position is below the field specified by the string.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text for a Text sectional element.

nested_items.name: level
nested_items.description: Specifies the size of the font for a Heading sectional element. Valid values are 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6.

nested_items.name: orientation
nested_items.description: Specifies the orientation for a Divider sectional element. Valid values are horizontal or vertical.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Excludes a sectional element that was generated by default for a specified data model.

nested_items.name: schemaVersion
nested_items.description: The schema version of the form when it was imported.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: position
nested_items.description: The position of the button.

nested_items.name: excluded
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the button is visible on the form.

nested_items.name: children
nested_items.description: Describes the button's properties.

nested_items.description: The field position is fixed and doesn't change in relation to other fields.

nested_items.name: labelDecorator
nested_items.description: Specifies an icon or decoration to display on the form.
